sourcesContent: /* Import Google Fonts */ @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Montserrat:wght@400;600;700&family=Tajawal:wght@400;600&display=swap'); /* Reset and General Styles */ * { margin: 0; padding: 0; box-sizing: border-box; } body { font-family: 'Tajawal', sans-serif; background-color: #f4f4f4; } a { text-decoration: none; color: inherit; } button { cursor: pointer; border: none; outline: none; } /* Enhanced Story Widget Styles */ .story-widget { position: fixed; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7); backdrop-filter: blur(10px); /* Adds glassmorphism effect */ overflow-y: auto; z-index: 1000; display: flex; align-items: flex-start; justify-content: center; padding-top: 5vh; } /* Glassmorphism Effect on the Story Content */ .story-content { background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8); /* Transparent background */ backdrop-filter: blur(15px); /* Glass-like blur */ padding: 2rem; border-radius: 20px; max-width: 700px; width: 90%; box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2); position: relative; animation: scaleUp 0.8s cubic-bezier(0.2, 0.8, 0.2, 1) forwards; /* Smooth scaling animation */ transform: scale(0.9); /* Initial smaller size for scaling effect */ } /* Stylish Close Button */ .close-button { background: none; border: none; font-size: 2rem; font-weight: bold; color: #ff6f61; /* Custom color */ position: absolute; top: 1rem; right: 1rem; cursor: pointer; transition: transform 0.3s ease; } .close-button:hover { transform: scale(1.2); /* Close button animation on hover */ } /* Typography for the Story Title */ .story-title { font-size: 2.5rem; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; font-family: 'Montserrat', sans-serif; font-weight: 700; color: #333; text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 0.05em; text-align: center; position: relative; } .story-title:before { content: ''; position: absolute; left: 50%; transform: translateX(-50%); width: 60px; height: 4px; background-color: #ff6f61; bottom: -10px; } /* Story Text */ .story-text { font-size: 1.2rem; line-height: 1.8; color: #555; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; text-align: justify; font-family: 'Tajawal', sans-serif; } .story-subheading { font-size: 1.8rem; margin: 2rem 0 1rem; font-weight: 600; color: #ff6f61; /* Emphasize subheadings */ } .story-list { list-style-type: disc; margin-left: 20px; } .story-list li { margin-bottom: 1rem; font-size: 1.1rem; color: #444; } /* Call-to-Action Button at the End */ .book-button { display: inline-block; margin-top: 2rem; padding: 1rem 2.5rem; background-color: #ff6f61; color: #fff; border-radius: 50px; text-transform: uppercase; font-weight: bold; text-align: center; transition: background-color 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease; box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); } .book-button:hover { background-color: #e65b50; box-shadow: 0 10px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15); } /* Key Animation Effects */ @keyframes scaleUp { 0% { transform: scale(0.9); opacity: 0; } 100% { transform: scale(1); opacity: 1; } } @keyframes fadeInUp { 0% { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(50px); } 100% { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); } } /* Media Queries for Mobile Responsiveness */ @media (max-width: 768px) { .story-title { font-size: 2rem; } .story-text { font-size: 1.1rem; } .story-content { padding: 1.5rem; } .book-button { padding: 0.75rem 2rem; } }
